_header: Young men that bearen them so gay
_description: A song of Doomsday — five quatrains and burden: Gay gay to be gay / I holde it but a vanite

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Ȝyng men þat bern hem so gayThey think not on
                    domysday…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Þat arte haght ben & alwey isBeforn myn angel[e]
                    fayr & fre
